name: df-marepv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(cmatrepV, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmap, cv(s0)), cmpt(s4, cv(s0), cmpo(s5, s6, cv(s0), cv(s0), cif(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s6)), wceq(cv(s6), cv(s4))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ matRepV =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat]s1)), s3 ‚àà((Base ` s1)[‚Ü¶]s0)‚Ü¶(s4 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶(s5 ‚àà s0, s6 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ if(s6 = s4,(s3 ` s5),(s5[s2]s6))))))
comment: Function replacing a column of a matrix by a vector. (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 26-Feb-2019.)
